question: When were post-Pokhran II sanctions imposed on India lifted by the US?
option1: In the wake of 9/11 in October, 2001.
option2: At the time of US attack on Iraq in March, 2003
option3: On the eve of inauguration of Bush in the second term in January, 2005
option4: In September, 2005 during 60 th UN General Assembly meet
answer: In the wake of 9/11 in October, 2001.
explanation: In the wake of 9/11 in October, 2001 post-Pokhran II sanctions imposed on India lifted by the US.
